[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Real

noncomputable abbrev P2005AMCB_13_answer : ℝ := sorry
theorem P2005AMCB_13 :
  ∀ (x : ℕ → ℝ), (∀ n ∈ Finset.range 124, (4 + n : ℝ) ^ (x n) = (5 + n : ℝ)) →
